Translated from Spanish by Johnny of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señorita Libi Vanessa pertenece al banco comunal Mariscal Cáceres. Vive en la región de San Martín, provincia Mariscal Cáceres y distrito de Juanjui. Se dedica a la venta de utensilios y menaje de cocina y el negocio está ubicado en Jr. Eduardo Peña Meza No. 555.

Con el préstamo de S/. 2,000, el que pagará en 6 meses, comprará ollas, utensilios, bandejas, cestas para ropa y platos de loza.

La señorita Libi Vanessa tiene 20 años, vive todavía con sus padres quienes la apoyan mucho y como familia unida están saliendo adelante y cumpliendo metas. Actualmente es muy joven, pero ya se siente una mujer realizada y con una autoestima muy elevada porque ella también estudia en la Universidad.

loans.use: Buy kitchen pots and pans, utensils, trays, hampers for clothes, and ceramic plates.

loans.name: Nisida

texts.es:
Mrs. Nisida belongs to the communal bank of democratic women. She lives in the region of San Martin, in the province of Mariscal Cáceres, and in the district of Juanjui. She works buying and selling chickens, and the business is located in the forth block of La Prolongación Grau.

With a loan of 1,000.00 Peruvian Soles, which she will repay in 6 months, she will buy chickens. She buys chickens daily, which means she will invests some of the money each day. She will also build more cages for the chickens.

Mrs. Nisida is 42 years of age. She lives with her husband and three children. As a family they work hard to support themselves, sacrificing other needs, but little by little they are seeing the results to their hard work.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Nisida pertenece al banco comunal Mujeres Democráticas. Vive en la región San Martín, provincia de Mariscal Cáceres y distrito de Juanjui. Se dedica a la compra y venta de gallinas y el negocio está ubicado en la Prolongación Grau cuadra 04.

Con el préstamo de S/.1,000.00, el cual pagará en 6 meses, comprará gallinas, pero sus compras lo hace diariamente, eso quiere decir que invierte a diario, además construirá más jaulas para tener gallinas.

La señora Nisida tiene 42 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos y como familia trabajan duro para salir adelante sacrificando otras necesidades, pero poco a poco están viendo los resultados.

loans.use: Purchase small animals (chickens)

loans.name: Santo Tomás

texts.es:
Mr. Santo is a merchant that sells cleaning products door to door. His wife works washing and ironing clothes for pay. With the meager income that both jobs generate, they have been able to subsist and make a living for their family. They have three children: a 7 years old girl and two boys, 3 years and one and a half years old.

Santo’s house has a dirt floor and walls made out of zinc sheets. He is requesting the loan as he believes is time to take a new step in his life and give his family a dignified and comfortable home. He wants to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron, in order to build concrete walls for his house. He wants to progressively improve his home. His next goal is to build a concrete floor, as the present dirt one generates humidity -and hence sickness in his children.

Translated from Spanish by Leticia Britos, Kiva Volunteer.

Don Santo es un comerciante que se dedica a la venta ambulante de productos de limpieza. Es casado y su esposa se dedica a lavar y planchar ropa ajena. Con los pocos ingresos que generan ambos trabajos, los dos han podido subsistir y sacar adelante a su familia. Tienen 3 hijos: una niña de 7 años y dos varones, de 3 años y un pequeño de año y medio.

La casa de Santo es de piso de tierra y paredes de láminas de zinc. Él cree que ya es hora de dar un paso más en su vida y poder darle una casa digna y cómoda a su familia, por lo que solicita el crédito. Quiere comprar bloques, cemento, arena y hierro para empezar a levantar las paredes de su casa de concreto. Quiere ir mejorando su casa poco a poco, y su próxima aspiración es ponerle piso de concreto a su vivienda, ya que el piso de tierra genera mucha humedad y enfermedad para sus hijos.

loans.use: Build concrete walls for his house.

loans.name: Romelia

texts.es:
Mrs. Romelia belongs to the communal bank Mujeres Democraticas (democratic women). She lives in the region of San Martin, Mariscal Caceres province, Juanjui district. She works selling animals (chickens and pigs) and the business is located in the Jr. Santa Rosa s/n. Thanks to the support of her husband and to her own efforts, she has manages to increase her sales, because originally she sold only chickens and now she also sells pigs.

With the loan for S/. 2,000, which she will pay back in 6 months, she will buy chickens and pigs, and her investment is daily.

Mrs. Romelia is 43 years old and lives with her husband and her two children who give her support and together as a family they have managed to achieve many goals.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva volunteer

La señora Romelia pertenece al banco comunal Mujeres Democráticas. Vive en la región San Martín, provincia de Mariscal Cáceres y distrito de Juanjui. Se dedica a la venta de animales (gallinas y cerdos) y el negocio esta ubicado en el Jr. Santa Rosa s/n. Gracias al apoyo de su esposo y al esfuerzo propio ha logrado incrementar sus ventas porque inicialmente vendía sólo gallinas y ahora vende también cerdos. Con el préstamo de S/. 2,000, el cual pagará en 6 meses, comprará gallinas y cerdos y su inversión es diaria. La señora Romelia tiene 43 años y vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos quienes la apoyan y juntos como familia están logrando cumplir muchas metas.

loans.use: Buying small animals (chickens and pigs) (Compra de animales menores (gallinas y cerdos))

loans.name: Salvadora

texts.es:
Mrs. Salvadora belongs to the communal bank El Breo, lives in the San Martin region, Mariscal Caceres province, and Juanjui district. She works selling basic needs products, women's clothing, and the business is located in the Jr. Manco Capac #427. Thanks to her and her husband's initiative they managed to have a business and they put a lot of effort and time into making sure they succeed, increasing their sales.

With the loan for S/.3,000.00 which she will pay in 6 months, she will buy groceries like sacks of sugar and rice, milk Pura Vida in boxes, milk Gloria in boxes, soap Bolivar in boxes and some clothing for women.

Mrs. Salvadora is 48 years old, and lives with her husband and daughter who support her unconditionally in the business, demonstrating that united as a family, it is possible to achieve success in the goals we make for ourselves.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva volunteer

La señora Salvadora pertenece al banco comunal El Breo. Vive en la región San Martín, provincia de Mariscal Cáceres y distrito de Juanjui. Se dedica al comercio de venta de abarrotes y ropas para damas y el negocio está ubicado en el Jr. Manco Cápac No. 427. Gracias a la iniciativa de su esposo y de ella han lograron tener un negocio y ahora ponen mucho esfuerzo y tiempo para lograr tener éxito, incrementando de esa manera sus ventas. Con el préstamo de S/.3,000.00, el cual pagará en 6 meses, comprará abarrotes como azúcar y arroz en sacos, leche Pura Vida en caja, leche Gloria en caja, jabón Bolívar en caja y un poco de ropa para damas. La señora Salvadora tiene 48 años, vive con su esposo y una hija que la apoyan incondicionalmente en el negocio, demostrando así que unidos como familia se puede lograr tener éxito en las metas que nos proponemos.

loans.use: Buying groceries (sugar, rice, milk, etc) and women's clothing (Compra de abarrotes (azúcar, arroz, leche, etc) y ropa para dama.)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a welding machine and a metal cutter

loans.name: Flor Del Café Paquip Group

texts.es:
Flor D. Café Paquip is maD. up of a group of micro-entrepreneurs with a lot of charisma. This group is remarkable because of their dynamics. Even though this is their first loan, these excellent weavers from Santa Clara la laguna, have known each other for years because they are from the same town.

Many of these weavers have specialized in doing embroidery of traditional blouses. They embroider flowers and birds onto crochet blouses in colors lilac, baby blue, pink, and white. There are also weavers so create the beautiful cloth that is used to make, mostly, huipiles (the blouse of the traditional dress of Guatemala), table runners, and individual table mats. In the group there are also two women who raise animals.

These clients will use their loan to buy thread and cloth to embroider and create traditional clothing. The other two women will invest in buying pigs; two pigs each, and food to fatten them for 3 months and then resell them at the market at almost twice the initial price.

These women dream of buying land to expand or build their houses for their sons and daughters. They would also like to have successful businesses to ensure that their children can go to school, and why not, maybe college. These women stopped thinking about their needs a along time ago. They started their families at a very young age and they are devoted to the wellbeing and future of their children, which is a very special quality. However, on their own they will not be able to make it out of poverty. They need your support so that they can make their dreams come true.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva volunteer

Flor del Café Paquip está conformado por un grupo D. microempresarias con mucho carisma. Este grupo destaca por la dinámica que tiene. A pesar D. ser su primer crédito, estas excelentes tejedoras D. Santa Clara la laguna se conocen D. años atrás por ser del mismo pueblo.

Muchas D. estas tejedoras se han especializado en el bordado D. blusas tradicionales. Ellas bordan flores y aves en blusas D. crochet D. color lila, celeste, rosado y blanco. También, encontramos tejedoras que elaboran preciosos lienzos D. telas que son utilizados para hacer, en su mayoría, huipiles (la blusa del traje tradicional D. Guatemala), caminos D. mesa e individuales. Asimismo, en el grupo hay dos criadoras D. animales.

Estas clientas van a utilizar su préstamo para comprar hilos y tela para bordar y elaborar tejidos tradicionales. Las otras dos señoras van a invertir en comprar cerdos, dos cerdos respectivamente, y comprar comida para engordarlos durante 3 meses y luego revenderlos en el mercado casi al doble del precio.

Estas señoras sueñan con comprarse un terreno para poder ampliar su casa o para construir una casa para sus hijos e hijas. También a ellas les gustaría tener un negocio exitoso para asegurar que sus hijos puedan ir al colegio, y porque no a la universidad. Estas mujeres dejaron D. pensar en sus necesidades hace mucho tiempo. Ellas desD. que empezaron con su familia a muy temprana edad, están avocadas al bienestar y el futuro D. sus hijos, esta es una cualidad realmente especial. Sin embargo, solas no van a poder salir D. la pobreza, ellas necesitan tu apoyo para que puedan realizar sus sueños.

loans.use: Buying thread and cloth to embroider and create regional woven items. Buying and raising pigs (Estas clientas van a utilizar su préstamo para comprar hilos y tela para bordar y elaborar tejidos tradicionales.Comprar y criar cerdos)

loans.name: Lucia Del Rosario

texts.es:
Lucía is 42 years old and is married. She lives in the Hialeah de Managua neighborhood with her husband. They have not yet had children. Lucía works as treasurer for a private company and her husband is an industrial mechanic.

They own a very humble home, and have improved their quality of life with much effort. They would use their loan to purchase zinc roofing tiles for their bedroom, given that it is summer and the heat with their current low roof is oppressive. In addition, the roof is in disrepair and needs to be mended before winter arrives.

Lucía would like to live a more dignified life by making some improvements to the condition of her home.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Lucía tiene 42 años y es casada. Junto a su esposo habitan en el barrio Hialeah de Managua y todavía no tienen hijos. Lucia trabaja en una empresa privada como responsable de tesorería y su esposo es mecánico industrial. Ambos poseen una casa muy humilde que han ido levantando con mucho esfuerzo. El crédito lo usarán para comprar láminas de zync para levantar el techo de un cuarto de habitación, ya que en la época de verano y con el techo muy bajo el calor que se siente es muy fuerte, a parte de eso se encuentra muy deteriorado y necesitan arreglarlo antes de que el iniverno entre. Lucia quiere llegar a tener una casa completamente acondicionada para poder habitar dignamente en ella.

loans.use: Purchase zinc tiles to repair/raise roof over bedroom.

loans.name: Abel

texts.en:
Abel A. is married with a two month old daughter. He is a vendor who has a store connected to his house in which his wife runs the front counter. He first entered the line of business with his father. Over the years he saved and soon had enough to open his own business.

He hopes to have more children in the near future, but wants to be sure he will have enough money to raise them well. He needs to increase his business and keep it stocked at all times. For this reason he asks for a loan which will allow him to buy various goods like men and women, makeup, jewelry, etc.

loans.use: To buy spices, hair dye, grocery bags, under garments for men and women, light bulbs, makeup, women’s jewelry.

loans.name: Geronima

texts.es:
Jerónima V. a thirty one year old mother of one is the owner of a popular clothing store. With savings from her previous job she opened the store in order to provide for her daughter who is entering the first grade in the Municipal School of Caaguazú.

Her dream is to continue expanding the store and make it a place where people can come and find any clothes they may want. This is why she is asking for a loan. Jerónima will buy shirts, t-shirts, shorts, pants, underwear for both men and women, along with sandals, shoes, and sports shoes.

loans.use: To buy clothes for her store including t-shirts, shorts, pants, under garments for men and women, blouses, sandals, and sports shoes.

loans.name: Geronima

texts.en:
Jerónima V. a thirty one year old mother of one is the owner of a popular clothing store. With savings from her previous job she opened the store in order to provide for her daughter who is entering the first grade in the Municipal School of Caaguazú.

Her dream is to continue expanding the store and make it a place where people can come and find any clothes they may want. This is why she is asking for a loan. Jerónima will buy shirts, t-shirts, shorts, pants, underwear for both men and women, along with sandals, shoes, and sports shoes.

loans.use: To buy clothes for her store including t-shirts, shorts, pants, under garments for men and women, blouses, sandals, and sports shoes.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia N. is a young 25 year old woman who still lives at home with her parents and seven siblings in a house in the San Miguel neighborhood of Caaguazú. She has only had formal schooling till fifth grade, and for health reasons had to leave. She unfortunately has a sight problem.

For this reason, her father, a farmer, sold some of their animals in order to begin a business of a general store for his daughter. She has been a great business woman and hasn’t let her visual impairment get in the way of the sales. Her dedicated customers say that they buy goods from her because she is personable and has a great variety of products to offer.

She is asking for a loan to buy flour, sugar, rice, powdered drinks, cans of oil and peaches, powdered soap, cigarettes and refreshments for her general store. With an increase in stock she will be able to service more customers.

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar, rice, powdered drinks, cans of oil, cigarettes, canned peaches, an assortment of yerba, powdered soap, and refreshments for his general store.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.en:
Gustavo is a 23 year old man who is a graduate of technical training school where he specialized in electricity. He currently works in a car shop where he fixes both cars and electronic appliances.

He began this line of work in his family’s auto shop. The capital he made working in his family’s auto shop allowed him to venture out on his own and purchase a piece of land, a shop the tools he needed to begin his business. He works to support his wife and their first child which is on the way.

The loan that he is asking for is to invest in paints, fiberglass, windshields, and other car parts needed in the shop.

loans.use: To buy paints, windshields, fiberglass, and other car supplies.

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es:
Enrique R. works as a laborer on contract in constructions, and he also does soldering jobs. He lives in the western slope of the city of La Paz, Alto Tacagua zone.

Currently, he does not have the tools necessary to do this work, and this is why he has come to Impro for a loan that will allow him to complete his working tools and bring his costs down.

This is the third time he has requested a loan. His history in our institution qualifies him as "client 1", meaning a good record paying back his loan. The amount he requests will be used for buying his working tools (drill, welding arc, sharpener).

His credit history and job qualify him for this loan, because he has experience doing arrangement and artisanal installations, which yields him an income to cover the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva volunteer

Enrique R., trabaja como albañil contratista de obras de construcción, y también realiza trabajos de soldadura, vive en la ladera Oeste de la ciudad de La Paz, zona Alto Tacagua.

En la actualidad no cuenta con herramientas necesarias para realizar este trabajo y por ello ha recurrido a Impro por un crédito que le permita completar su equipo de trabajo y abaratar sus costos.. Es la tercera vez que solicita un crédito. Su historial en nuestra institución lo califica como cliente 1, es decir con cumplimiento bueno en el pago de su obligación. El monto solicitado será destinado para la compra de herramientas de trabajo (Taladro, arco de soldar y amoladora). Sus antecedentes crediticios y trabajo le permiten acceder a este crédito ya que tiene experiencia realizando trabajos de instalaciones arreglos y artesanía., lo cual le permite alcanzar ingresos para cubrir el préstamo.

loans.use: working capital (buying tools)

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Mrs. Lourdes lives in her in-laws' home in the street C #22 of the Llojeta el Vergel zone in the city of La Paz. She is 27 years old and lives with her husband who is a mechanic.

She works selling dairy products in the Llojeta market in a kiosk, which she owns. With this activity she helps support her son and cover the family needs.

The loan she requests is to expand her business, increasing her working capital. She is a new client in our institutions and is eligible for a loan according to our analysis.

Translated from Spanish by Eliana Colunga, Kiva volunteer

La señora Lourdes vive en casa de sus suegros en la calle C Nº 22 de la zona de Llojeta el Vergel de la ciudad de La Paz, tiene 27 años y vive con su esposo el cual es mecánico.

La actividad que realiza es la venta de productos lácteos en el mercado de Llojeta en un kiosco del cual es propietaria, con esta actividad ayuda a mantener a su hijo y cubrir sus necesidades familiares.

El crédito que solicita es para ampliar su negocio incrementando su capital de trabajo, es un cliente nuevo en nuestra institución y puede acceder a un crédito de acuerdo al análisis efectuado.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Carmen Rosa works as a financial assistant in a multidisciplinary consulting office. Her home is located in the Pampahasi Alto zone on the east side of La Paz. She is single, but is in charge of her younger sisters after their parents passed away. This is the first time she has requested a loan that will be used to complete an upper-level course. Her goal is to earn her degree in public accounting so she can improve her salary possibilities in her line of work. She has five years seniority at her work, which is why she has the ability to cover her requirements.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Carmen Rosa trabaja como asistente contable en una oficina de consultoría multidisciplinaria. Su domicilio se encuentra ubicado en la zona de Pampahasi Alto, ladera Este de la ciudad de La Paz, es soltera pero está a cargo de sus hermanos menores pues sus padres fallecieron. Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito, el mismo que será destinado para realizar su un curso superior con el objetivo de obtener su licenciatura en contaduría pública para mejorar las condiciones salariales en su fuente de trabajo. Tiene una antigüedad en su trabajo de 5 años, por lo que tiene las posibilidades de cubrir su requerimiento.

loans.use: Tuition while working toward an accounting degree

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a wife, a mother and an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling women’s clothing, jewelry, cosmetics and nail care products. She has a constant clientele of women buying her products and her business has grown significantly since it first opened 3 years ago.

She began the business with the help of some of her husband’s savings. The store has since grown into not just a clothing store for women, but also a small nail salon, and she now carries clothing for men and children as well.

Gladys has received many new orders and demand for men and children’s clothing. With the loan she will continue to invest in more clothing, perfume and cologne, along with products for her nail salon. By increasing the quantity, quality and variety of products she hopes it will bring new clientele.

loans.use: To buy jewelry, perfume and women’s clothing.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.es:
Vladimir works the nightshift as an administrative secretary at a public school in the city of La Paz. He lives in the Villa San Antonio zone on the east side of La Paz. This is the third time that he has requested a loan. The amount requested will be used for purchasing phone stalls for an Internet service center that he has in the same area where he lives. That way, he can improve his monthly income; by working at a state school he makes the minimum national wage. The credit analysis we performed allows him access to this credit since he has experience in economic activities, which will help him to obtain income and cover this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Vladimir trabaja como secretario administrativo en un colegio fiscal de la ciudad de La Paz (turno de la noche). Vive en la zona Villa San Antonio, ladera este de la ciudad de La Paz. Es la tercera vez que solicita un crédito. El monto solicitado será destinado para la compra de cabinas telefónicas, en un centro de servicio de Internet que tiene en la misma zona donde vive, y así podrá mejorar sus ingresos mensuales ya que al trabajar para un colegio estatal tiene el salario mínimo nacional. . El análisis de crédito que efectuamos le permite acceder a este crédito ya que tiene experiencia en su actividad económica, la misma que le servirá para obtener ingresos y para cubrir el préstamo.

loans.use: Purchase phone stalls

loans.name: Esperanza Y Fe Group

texts.en:
This committee of 17 dedicated women entrepreneurs is located in the San Pedro neighborhood, in the city of Encarnación. Each woman owns her own business and they come together for required weekly meetings to discuss their businesses, the successes and failures. As a committee of women, they are bound to each other when they ask for loans as a whole group. At the weekly meetings the women are expected to pay their loan payments and this serves as a support system for the women.

The businesses of these women include: grocery stores, hair salons, tailor shops, clothing, jewelry and cosmetic sales, and different food products. Each of these business women will use their portion of the loan to buy the goods needed for their specialty, and they are each responsible to one another to make payments on time.

loans.use: These women all own very different businesses and the loan will be used to buy different products including clothing,  cosmetics and skin products, jewelry, hair products, ingredients for baked goods, canned goods, rice, flour, pasta, refreshments, fabric, linen, thread, buttons, elastic and to buy various types of seeds.

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.es:
Fernanda has a grocery store, and her husband has an oven where he makes stuffed pastries and cheese turnovers. In the warm season, he makes ice cream that is sold at a sales stand at the Don Bosco High School in the city of El Alto. These are their primary sources of income with which they use to cover the room and board and education of their two children that still live with them. They live in the Satellite City zone of El Alto.

Their first credit from Kiva was invested in the purchase of machinery for making ice cream. With this loan, they will purchase raw materials. This is the fifth loan with IMPRO; their good payment record and the growth of Fernanda’s family’s business authorizes them for approval of the requested loan.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Fernanda, tiene una tienda de abarrotes, su esposo un horno donde elabora salteñas y empanadas en de queso. En temporada de calor elabora helados que son comercializados en un puesto de venta en la Escuela Superior Don Bosco de la Ciudad de EL Alto, estos son sus principales fuente generadoras de ingreso con lo que cubre la manutención y educación universitaria de sus dos hijos que están todavía con la parejas; vive en la Zona Ciudad Satélite de la Ciudad de El Alto.

El primer crédito financiado por Kiva fue invertido en la compra de maquinaria (Maquina para elaborar helado); con este préstamo comprara materia prima. Es el quinto crédito con IMPRO, el buen comportamiento de pago y el crecimiento de la microempresa de la familia de Fernanda le faculta para la aprobación del préstamo solicitado.

loans.use: Purchase of basic materials.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Rosa, 51, is married and she and her husband, a cab driver, have 3 children, all of whom are in college. Despite having few resources, this couple has managed to set up a better future for their children who expect to go on to professional careers. For now, though, Rosa and her husband must still support them.

Rosa is a woman who has contributed to improving her neighborhood. She's the director of an "Apadrinamientos" (Mentoring) program for local children, a project funded by the European Union, and she serves as the neighborhood's "Lider Comunal".

Rosa is applying for a loan because she has to complete a wall that doesn't quite stretch all the way around her small house. The wall will provide extra security for the house which stands empty most days because the children are away at college and Rosa and her husband are away working.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Doña Rosa tiene 51 años de edad, es casada, su esposo trabaja como taxista, tuvo 3 hijos todos seencuentran estudiando en la universidad, pese a la dura situación económica de esta familia que son de escasos recursos económicos, han logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos y los estan preparando para formarlos como profesionales, en estos momentos los jovenes no poseen empleos , es por eso que Doña Rosa y su esposo los suiguen manteniendo económicamante.

La Sra. Rosa es una mujer que ha contribuido en el Fortalecimiento y Crecimiento de su barrio, actualmente se desempeña como responsable de un Programa de Apadrinamientos para niños pobres de la comunidad donde habita, este programa es financiado por la Unión Europea, al mismo tiempo la Sra. es Líder Comunal de su barrio, en donde brinda apoyo y capacitación a la población del sector sobre el Desarrollo Integral de sus familias y vida.

En estos momentos, la Sra. Necesita un préstamo ya que su prioridad es la de construir el muro de atrás de su humilde vivienda, ya que necesita cerrarla completamente y así darle mayor seguridad, ya que la vivienda permanece sola, sus hijos estudian todo el día, su esposo y ella salen a trabajar todo el día.

loans.use: Build a security wall.

loans.name: Araceli

texts.es:
Aracely, 31, is married; her husband, 43, is an auto mechanic and he and Aracely have 3 boys who are 7-, 13- and 16-years old. The youngest is in second grade and the older two are in high school. Aracely has had a shop in her house for some years. She sells cosmetics, food and other everyday products. She's an enterprising woman who supplies the things that her neighbors need and her business is highly regarded in the neighborhood.

Her husband doesn't always have work and they can't always count on his income so Aracely does everything she can to sell as much as she can. As the new school year approaches, her customers have asked her for school supplies like notebooks, backpacks, uniforms, etc., but Arcely doesn't have enough resources to meet the demand and, consequently, she's applying for this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Doña Aracely tiene 31 años, es casada, su esposo se desempeña como Mecánico Automotriz y tiene 43 años, ambos han procreado a 3 hijos varones de 7, 13 y 16 años, el pequeño se encuentra cursando 2 grado de primaria y los otros dos están estudiando en secundaria. Doña Aracely es una comerciante que tiene una tienda en su casa de habitación en la cual lleva ya algun tiempo de trabajo, en su negocio vende cosméticos, granos básicos, productos perecederos, y otros productos propios de un hogar. Aracely es una mujer emprendedora ya que ha ido surtiendo su negocio con diferentes productos necesaR. en los hogares de su vecino. actualmente su negocio goza de mucho prestigio entre sus vecinos.

El trabajo que desempeña su esposo es de manera esporádico y no cuenta con un ingreso fijo para su familia, es por eso que Aracely se esfuerza mucho para poder veder la mayor cantidad de productos posibles. Se esta aproximando la entrada a clases y sus clientas le están solicitando útiles escolares como son cuadernos, mochilas, uniformes, y en estos momentos la Sra. no cuenta con los suficientes recursos para poder satisfacer esa demanda, es por eso que solicita un préstamo.

loans.use: Buy products for resale.

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es:
Petronila lives in the Laureles Norte neighborhood of Managua. She's married, a homemaker with grown children, only one of whom, a 20-year old daughter, still lives at home. The daughter is a single mother with a young son. Petronila's husband is a cab driver. He and their daughter both work and contribute to the household's expenses.

Petronila stays home days, caring for her little grandson. The Laureles Norte neighborhood is considered one of the most dangerous in Managua. Petronila doesn't feel safe there alone and she wants to complete the wall at the rear of her house. Her husband and daughter will contribute to repaying this loan that will provide greater security for Petronila and her grandson.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Doña Petronila habita en el barrio Laureles Norte de Managua. Se dedica al cuido de su hogar, es casada, sus hijos son mayores de edad e independientes, sólo una hija vive con ella, la menor de 20 años es madre soltera y tiene un hijo. El esposo de Doña Petronila es taxero y es quien junto a la hija de ambos quien tambien trabaja, quienes se dedican a llevar el alimento a su familia.

Doña petronila se queda todo el día al cuido de su pequeño nieto.El barrio Laureles Norte es catalagado como uno de los barrios más peligrosos, es por eso que Doña Petronila se siente insegura, y necesita cerrar el muro trasero de su casa, su esposo y su hija aportarán para pagar este préstamo y poderle brindar seguridad a Doña Petronila y a su nieto, quienes pasan solos todo el día en la casa de habitación

loans.use: Build a security wall.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa, 58, lives with her husband in the Milagro de Dios neighborhood. She has 4 children, all grown, who no longer live with her.

Rosa has a beauty salon in her house, a business that she's operated for some years. She says that she's proud of the business because she's been able to do something that she enjoys and because she's managed to keep it afloat despite many past difficulties. Rosa's husband is a cab driver and they both contribute to the costs of running the household.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Doña Rosa tiene 58 años de edad, y junto a su esposo habita en el Barrio Milagro de Dios. Doña Rosa tuvo 4 hijos, todos ellos son mayores de edad y ya no viven con ella.

Doña Rosa tiene un salón de belleza en su casa de habitación negocio en el cual lleva ya varios años, y el cual dice ella misma la ha hecho sentirse orgullosa por poder hacer lo que le gusta y por que lo ha mantenido a flote a pesar de tantas dificultades por las que ha pasado. El marido de doña Rosa es Taxero y le ayuda con los gastos de la casa.

loans.use: Buy mirrors and chairs for beauty salon business.

loans.name: Virtudes

texts.en: Virtudes is a 39 year old mother of three. Her husband works as truck driver for a local company. Virtudes lives in Casabe, a community of Santo Domingo. She earns a living running a business that is very unusual in her community; she lends money to women in the neighbourhood, charging them some interest. She has been running this business for more than ten years. Virtudes is employed in a local shop, and every month,  when she gets her salary, she puts aside some money to invest in the business. Her husband also helps with this business by contributing some of his wages. Virtudes says there are a lot of people who visit her house to use the services. She explains that she offers very low interest rates to the customers. The entrepreneur has requested a loan to continue with her activity.

loans.use: to invest in a small money-lending business.

loans.name: Maura Eugenia

texts.es:
Maura is a single mother. She has a daughter who helps her around the house. She lives in the La Primavera neighborhood, a place where people have few resources. From a very young age, Maura has had to make her own way and she now works buying and selling women's cosmetics. Her customers are her neighbors, friends and family. She also makes and sells prepared meals because that's what she's had to do to support herself and her daughter, without the help of anyone else.

Maura now needs to buy more cosmetics because her customers are demanding new kinds of products. She'd also like to sell clothing. Her goal is to set up a women's clothing and cosmetics store so that she can dedicate herself full-time to the business she enjoys so much.

Translated by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Doña Maura es madre soltera, tiene una hija quien le ayuda con los oficios de la casa, habita en el barrio La Primavera, una zona donde los habitantes son personas de escasos recursos económicos. Esta madre desde muy joven ha trabajado de manera independiente, en estos momentos la se dedica a comprar y vender cosméticos para damas, sus clientas directas son sus vecinas, amistades, familiares y por la noche la señora vende comida casera, es así como esta madre ha salido adelante con su esfuerzo y sin apoyo de nadie.

La señora Maura necesita en estos momentos comprar mas cosméticos debido que las clientas están exigiendo nuevas marcas, fragancias y colores de productos, así como también desean que les ofrezca ropa. La señora tiene como meta el de montar una tienda de ropa y cosméticos para damas, dedicándose de lleno a esta actividad, que tanto le gusta.

loans.use: Buy products for resale.

loans.name: Silvia Elena

texts.es:
Silvia is a young single mother who, at a very young age, had to find work to support her baby. For six years, she's worked in the bakery that her father left her. She makes "pan dulce" (pastries) and bread.

Silvia, driving hard to help her family get ahead, has grown the bakery substantially and she now has a van to deliver her products. Due to the high costs of ingredients for making bread and pastries, Silvia is applying for a loan to cover the costs of the ingredients. She also wants to add other baked goods to the breads and pastries she sells now. Her dream is to continue expanding the business.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Silvia es una joven madre soltera, quien a muy corta edad tuvo que buscar empleo para poder mantener a su bebé, es mdre soltera y hace seis años está al frente de la panadería que le herederó su papá.Elabora pan dulce y pan simple.

Silvia con muchas ganas de trabajar y sacar adelante a su familia a hecho crecer la panadería tanto que hoy en día cuenta con una camioneta para distribuir el producto a sus clientes. Debido al alto costo de la materia prima con que se hace el pan, Silvia está buscando el préstamo para poder cubrir el pago total de esta materia prima y además quiere introducirse en el negocio de la repostería. Su sueño más grande es poder ampliar el negocio y que este cubra la elaboración de pan y de repostería.

loans.use: Buy ingredients for bakery business.

loans.name: Erick Daniel

texts.es:
Erick, 28, is married and has a 3-year old son. His wife is a homemaker and they live in the Villa Reconciliacion neighborhood of Managua, a very poor neighborhood where people live on $2 a day. From the time Erick was 14-years old, he's worked in his father's business and over the years, he's moved up there so that he's now the manager of the business, Empresa Inmobiliaria Oriental. (An "inmobiliaria" is a realty company.)

Erick has been building his house and has already built a wall for it but, due to a lack of funds, it's only been finished in concrete. To make it more secure, he wants to reinforce it with iron (bars?) so he's applying for a loan with which he'll buy the iron (bars?) and other materials that he needs to finish the work.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Erick tiene 28 años, es casado, con un niño de 3 años de edad, su esposa cuida del niño y es ama de casa, habitan en el barrio Villa Reconciliación de Managua, barrio muy pobre donde los pobladores viven con $2 dólares al día. Erick desde los 14 años trabaja en el negocio de su padre, con los años ha ido progresando y hoy en dia es Responsable de Bodega y Fiscal de Proyecto de la Empresa Inmobiliaria Oriental.

Erick ha ido construyendo su casa, anteriormente construyó el muro delantero de la misma, pero debido al poco dinero con que contaba para realizar esta construcción la hizo sólo de concreto, hoy en día quiere asegurarla metiendole hierro al muro, es para eso que requeire del crédito para poder comprar el hierro y demás materiales necesarios para hacer esta obra.

loans.use: Security wall for house.

loans.name: Yolanda Del Rio Group

texts.es:
The association, Yolanda del Rio del Centro Focal de Villa Adela, owes its name to the deep respect and admiration that its 18 members have for the director of the Centro Focal de Villa Adela.

Most of the association's members are street vendors who, because they can't afford to set up shops, sell their wares in the principal markets of their town. They sell new and used clothing, domestic appliances and baked goods, among other things, and their businesses represent major sources of income for their families, most of which are married couples as only 10% of the association's members are single.

They now need funds to invest in their businesses, their common goal to generate enough money to pay for expenses related to the upcoming school year, for school supplies and for other expenses that they face year in and year out.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

La asociación Yolanda del Río del Centro Focal de Villa Adela, debe su nombre al cariño respeto y admiración que las 18 socias que componen la misma, le tienen a la responsable de dicho Centro.

En su mayoría, las socias se ven obligadas a deambular ofertando sus productos, por las principales ferias y mercados de sus zonas a raíz de la carencia de puestos de venta fijos. Ropa nueva y usada, electrodomésticos, repostería y otros, son pequeños negocios que les representa el sustento para sus familias, principalmente aquellas que son casadas, ya que de todo el grupo solo un 10% son solteras.

Actualmente ellas precisan de capital para invertir en sus negocios, con el objetivo de generar los recursos suficientes para hacer frente a la temporada de inicio de clases, listas de útiles e inscripciones que deben afrontar año tras año.

loans.use: Funds to invest in their businesses, their common goal to generate enough money to pay for expenses related to the upcoming school year, for school supplies and for other expenses that they face year in and year out.

loans.name: Golondrinas Group

texts.es:
Various endeavors, from making and selling food to sales of general merchandise, have brought together twelve women, most of whom are married with children, to form the association, Las Golondrinas ("The Swallows"), named for birds that in the winter travel long distances to find food for their chicks.

In the same way, these women travel long distances day in and day out to sell their products in the public markets of their town so that they can return home at the end of the day with enough money to keep their families going and provide for their children.

The traditional Alasitas market fair (a miniature and crafts fair) in La Paz, one of the most important of the year, is coming up so the association's members need funds to rent space and get their products ready so that they can generate sales and increase their incomes. That's especially important for the mothers in the group because, with the school year about to start, they'll see a big jump in their expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Jere Wiseman, Kiva Volunteer

Actividades distintas, como la preparación y venta de comida, y principalmente el comercio de todo tipo de mercadería ha reunido a un grupo de doce mujeres en su mayoría casadas y con hijos, que identificaron a su asociación como Las Golondrinas, aves que en invierno recorren largas distancias hasta lograr llegar a sus nidos con el alimento necesario para sus crías.

De igual forma estas mujeres recorren grandes distancias durante el día para lograr la venta de sus productos, en ferias, plazas, mercados de su zona para que al final del día puedan retornar a sus hogares con el dinero suficiente para sobrevivir día tras día y satisfacer las necesidades de sus hijos.

Próximamente, en la ciudad de La Paz se realizará la tradicional feria de Alasitas, (feria de la miniatura y artesanía), una de las más importantes del año, motivo por el cual las socias precisan de capital, con el fin de introducir su mercadería, alquilar algunos puestos, y poder generar la venta necesaria para incrementar sus ingresos, en vista de que se aproxima la temporada de inicio de clases, lo que representa un fuerte gasto para aquellas que son madres de familia.

loans.use: The traditional Alasitas market fair (a miniature and crafts fair) in La Paz, one of the most important of the year, is coming up so the association's members need funds to rent space and get their products ready so that they can generate sales and increase their incomes.  That's especially important for the mothers in the group because, with the school year about to start, they'll see a big jump in their expenses.

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru:
Parvina H. is 25 years old, single and does not have children. She has a college degree in programming. Parvina works as a programmer in the regional trade union of the city of Kurgan-Tube. She plans to use the obtained credit to purchase a personal computer to use at home. Having a computer at home will allow her to perfect her programming skills. She is planing to use her salary to repay the loan. Parvina is planing to repay the loan over a period of 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Хакимова Парвина, возраст – 25 лет, образование - высшее, по специальности программист, не замужем, детей не имеет. Парвина работает в областном профсоюзе города Курган-Тюбе на позиции программист. Полученный кредит она хочет использовать на приобретение собственного компьютера для дома. Кредит поможет ей приобрести собственный персональный компьютер для дома и совершенствовать свои зания в этой области. Кредит она планирует выплачивать за счёт получаемой заработной платы. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: to purchase a computer

loans.name: Parvina

texts.ru:
Parvina H. is 25 years old, single and does not have children. She has a college degree in programming. Parvina works as a programmer in the regional trade union of the city of Kurgan-Tube. She plans to use the obtained credit to purchase a personal computer to use at home. Having a computer at home will allow her to perfect her programming skills. She is planing to use her salary to repay the loan. Parvina is planing to repay the loan over a period of 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Хакимова Парвина, возраст – 25 лет, образование - высшее, по специальности программист, не замужем, детей не имеет. Парвина работает в областном профсоюзе города Курган-Тюбе на позиции программист. Полученный кредит она хочет использовать на приобретение собственного компьютера для дома. Кредит поможет ей приобрести собственный персональный компьютер для дома и совершенствовать свои зания в этой области. Кредит она планирует выплачивать за счёт получаемой заработной платы. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: to purchase a personal computer

loans.name: Samit

texts.en: Samit is currently 38 years old. He is married, and has four children. He lives with his family in the Salyan region, in the Khaladj village. Samit has 10 years of experience within the farming business, and would like a loan of $1200 to purchase a plot of land to improve his income and business.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land

loans.name: Djuraboy

texts.ru:
Djuraboy A. is 48 years old, married and has 6 children. He has a High School education. Djuraboy has been in the business of raising cattle for the past 5 years. This is his main source of income. He plans to use the obtained credit to purchase several additional animals. He plans to sell animals every 40 to 45 days. The obtained money will be used to purchase young animals. He plans to use the profit from the sale to purchase animal feed and to provide for his family. Djuraboy plans to repay the loan over a 12 months period.

Translated from Russian by Jane Mazur, Kiva volunteer

Абдузоиров Джурабой, возраст – 48 лет, образование среднее, женат, имеет 6-х детей. Джурабой занимается разведением и продажей крупного – рогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже в течение 5 лет. На полученный кредит он хочет приобрести несколько голов крупного – рогатого скота. Через каждые 40-45 дней он планирует продавать откормленный скот, а на вырученные деньги приобретать молодняк. Полученную прибыль от продажи он будет направлять на приобретение молодого скота и содержание своей семьи. Это основной вид деятельности, которым он занимается и который приносит ему доход. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: purchase cattle

loans.name: Sanan

texts.en: Sanan (his wife is pictured) was born in 1950. He is married and has 2 children. The M. family lives in the Salyan region, in the Yenikand village. Sanan has been in this business for 10 years. Now this family needs a loan of $1200 to buy the baling presses for improving their business.

loans.use: to buy the baling presses

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Komak Credit Union - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: Ziyahol

texts.ru:
Ziyahol S., who is 41, has high school education, is married, and has 2 children. Ziyahol is in the business of selling food products on one of the markets of the town of Jomi - "Oriyon - LTD". He has been in this business for the last 6 years. Using the credit, he plans to purchase larger quantity of inventory so he would not have to commute very often to get his goods. He obtains his inventory from Dushanbe city, located 60 miles away from Jomi. Every time he goes there, he incurs transportation costs, which is immediately reflected in the prices of his products. This loan, will give him an opportunity to purchase larger quantity of inventory, so he could sell his products at lower prices, which would not have to include transportation costs. He plans to pay off the loan within the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Сагизов Зияхол, возраст – 41 год, образование среднее, женат, имеет 2-х детей. Зияхол занимается торговлей продукатми питания на одном из рынков района Чоми, на рынке «Ориён-ЛТД». Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже в течение 6 лет. На полученный кредит он планирует закупить товаров, для того чтобы не ездить слишком часто за ним. Покупки он делает в городе Душанбе, находящимся на расстояние 100 км от города. При каждой поездке он несёт транспортные расходы, что в дальнейшем отражается на цене товара. Данный кредит даст возможность приобрести больше товара и продавать его населению по цене, которая не будет включать в себя большие транспортные расходя, связанные с доставкой товара. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To increase inventory

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru:
Mavluda V., who is 40, is not married, and has 2 children. Mavluda is in the business of selling clothes on one of the markets in the town of Vahdat. She has been doing that for the past 4 years. She plans to use the loan to increase the assortment of her inventory. This loan will permit her to increase the inventory turnover rate, which in turn will help her to increase profits that will be used to pay off the loan and support her family. This makes a difference because she is a single parent who upbrings 2 children. Mavluda will be paying off the loan within the next 6 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Вафоева Мавлюда, возраст – 40 лет, образование – среднее, незамужем, имеет 2-х детей. Мавлюда занимается торговлей вещами на рынке в городе Вахдате. Этим видом деятельности она занимается уже в течение 4 лет. Полученный кредит она планирует использовать на увелечение ассортимента продаваемого товара. Данный кредит поможет ей увеличить товарооборот, что в свою очередь увеличит её прибыль, которую она будет использовать на погашение кредита и содержание своей семьи, так как она мать-одиночка и воспитывает 2-х детей. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 6 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase additional assortment of goods for sale

loans.name: Tursunali

texts.ru:
Tursunali B., who is 68, has 5 children. He mainly works as an electrician. Tursunali owns a small piece of land next to his house. Because this time is a season for planting certain types of produce, Tursunali needs to purchase potato seeds that he could plant on his land. This loan will help to do just that - plant potato seeds on his land. He will sell part of the crops to the local residents and leave the rest for himself. He is planning to pay off the loan within 6 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Байбалаев Турсунали, возраст – 68 лет, образование – среднее специальное, по профессии – электрик, женат, имеет 5-х детей. Турсунали имеет небольшой приусадебный участок возле своего дома. Так как сейчас начался посевной сезон для некоторых видов сельхозкультур, Турсунали необходимы закупить семяна картофеля для засева своего участка. Данный кредит поможет приобрести семена картофеля и засеять приусадебный участок. Часть полученного урожая он планирует продать местным жителям, а оставшуюся часть оставить для собственных нужд. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 6 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds

loans.name: Hainisso

texts.ru:
Hainisso Y., who is 50, has a high-school education, is married, and has 5 children. Hainisso sells shoes for men and women on the central market of the town of Vahdat. She is planning to use the loan to purchase additional seasonal shoes. She purchases her goods in Dushanbe city, located 20 miles away from Vahdat. This loan will give local residents an opportunity to purchase winter shoes in their own town without incurring additional transportation costs. Hainisso will be paying off the loan within the next 6 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Ёрова Хайниссо, возраст – 50 лет, образование среднее, замужем, имеет 5-х детей. Хайниссо занимается торговлей на центральном рынке города Вахдата. Основным товаром, которым она торгует это мужская и женская обувь. Полученный кредит она хочет использовать на приобртение нового зимнего товара. Товар она покупает в городе Душанбе, находящимся в 30 км от города Вахдата. Данный кредит даст возможность местным жителям приобретать необходимую им зимную обувь у себя в городе, при этом не нести дополнительных транспортных расходов.. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 6 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase additional inventory

loans.name: Mahmadgies

texts.ru:
M. Kalandarov, who is 40 years old, has a Bachelors Degree in education, is married, and has 7 children. M. is currently working in a middle school № 29 in the town of Yavan. He owns some land right next to his house that he wants to use to grow wheat. He has been planting wheat there for the past 15 years. Using the loan, he is planning to purchase seeds for planting on his land. He will sell part of the crop to local residents and leave the rest for himself. This will also give an opportunity to the people from his town to purchase wheat seeds at a price lower than on the markets. In that region, seeds are in demand because they are commonly grinded and further used in baking bread for individual consumption. M. is planning to pay off the loan during the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Каландаров Махмадгиёс, возраст – 40 лет, образование – высшее, по профессии – педагог, женат, имеет 7-х детей. Махмадгиёс в настоящее время работает в средней школе № 29 города Явана. Возле своего дома он имеет небольшой участок земли, который он хочет засеять пшеницой. Он в течение 15 лет ежегодно засеивает свой участок пшеницой. Полученный кредит он хочет использовать на приобретение семян пшеницы для засева приусадебного участка. Часть полученного урожая он планирует продать местным жителям, а часть оставит себе для личных нужд. Жители района получат возможность купить зерно по более низкой цене, чем на рынке. Зерно жителями используется для перемолки и дальнейшей выпечки хлеба для собственного потребления. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев

loans.use: To purchase wheat seeds for planting

loans.name: Oyshajon

texts.ru:
Oyshajon D., who is 50 years old, has a Bachelors degree in Economics, is married, and has 5 children. Oyshajon has been in the business of selling children's toys, glassware, and gifts for the past 15 years. She rents a space on one of the markets in the town of Vahdat. Using the loan she is planning to purchase additional inventory. These funds will help her to increase the assortment of goods and help local residents have access to and ability to purchase a variety of glassware and other goods that she sells. Oyshajon will be paying off the loan withing the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Додочонова Ойшачон, возраст – 50 лет, образование – высшее, по специальности - экономист, замужем, имеет 5-х детей. Ойшачон занимается продажей детских игрушек, посудой и подарками. Этим видом деятельности она занимается уже в течение 15 лет. Для этого она арендует небольшой магазин на одном из рынков города Вахдата. На полученный кредит она планирует приобрести новый товар. Кредит поможет увеличить Ойшачон ассортимент продаваемого товара, а жители района всегда будут иметь возможность прийти к ней в магазин и приобрести, то что им надо из посуды или других вещей, которыми она торгует. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 6 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase additional assortment of inventory

loans.name: Muzafar

texts.ru:
Muzafar R., who is 32 years old, has a high school education, is married, and has 3 children. Muzafar is in the business of breeding and selling cattle. He has been doing this for the past 8 years. Using the obtained loan he plans to purchase additional cattle. Every 40-45 days, he plans to sell them and using the profits immediately buy more young bulls. He plans to use the proceeds to pay off the loan and to support his family. Muzafar will be paying off the loan during the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Vasilisa Budnikova, Kiva Volunteer.

Рахимов Музаффар, возраст – 32 года, образование – среднее, женат, имеет 3-х детей. Музафар занимается разведением и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже в течение 8 лет. Полученный кредит он хочет использовать на приобретение крупного рогатого скота. Через каждые 40-45 дней он планирует продавать скот, а на вырученные деньги приобретать молодых бычков для откормки. Полученную прибыль он будет использовать для погашения кредита и на одержание своей семьи. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: To purchase more cattle

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 24, 2008)

loans.name: Kumri

texts.ru:
Kumri H. is 38 years old, has a high school education, is married and has 3 children. Kumri sells clothing and has been in this business for 7 years. She will use her loan to purchase new products for sale. The loan will help local residents to purchase warm winter and children’s clothing at the local markets without having to spend extra money on transportation to travel to other markets.

Kumri will pay back the loan during a 6 month period.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Холикова Кумри, возраст – 38 лет, образование – среднее, замужем, имеет 3-х детей. Кумри занимается торговлей вещами. Этим видом деятельности она занимается уже в течение 7 лет. На полученный кредит она хочет приобрести новый ассортимент продаваемого товара. Даныый кредит даст возможность местным жителям приобретать необходимые им женские, детские теплые вещи, на рынке у себя на местном рынке, не выезжая при за его пределы и не неся дополнительные расходы связанные с транспортом. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 6 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase new products for sale

loans.name: Holmahmad

texts.ru:
Holmahmad R. is 36 years old, has a college education, work as an instructor at the Tajik National Teaching University, is married and has 1 child. Holmahmad has a small plot of land next to his house. He would like to get a loan to purchase wheat seeds because their price is much lower now than it will be in one month. He has been planting wheat for 10 years.

This loan will allow Holmahmad to purchase wheat for planting, plant his land, collect a harvest and use the wheat to make flour and bread for personal use. A bag of flour costs much more at a store and Holmahmad’s teaching salary is often not enough to pay for it. He will pay back the loan by using part of his salary. Holmahmad plans to pay back the loan over a 12 month period.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Рахимов Холмахмад, возраст – 36 лет, образование – высшее, работает в Таджикском Государственном Педагогическом Университете преподавателем, женат, имеет 1 – го ребёнка. Холмахмад имеет небольшой приусадебный участок возле своего дома. Так как наступает посевной сезон, она хочет получить кредит и приобрести семена пшеницы, так как в настоящее время цена на них намного ниже, чем будет через месяц. Этим видом деятельности она занимается уже в течение 10 лет. Данный кредит даст ему возможность приобрести семена пшеницы, засеять участок земли, собрать урожай и использовать пшеницу для производства муки и выпечки хлеба для личног потребления. Так как мешок муки в магазине стоит намного больше и не всегда хватает на это зарплаты преподователя. Кредит клиент планирует погашать свой кредит за счёт получаемой заработной платы. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase wheat for planting

loans.name: Hudoyberdi

texts.ru:
Hudoyberdi A. is 34 years old, has a college education, is a teacher by profession is married and has 2 children. Hudoyberdi raises and sells livestock. He has been in this business for 11 years. He would like to use his loan to purchase livestock, which he will fatten and sell every 40-45 days. He will use his profits to support his family as this business is his main source of income.

Hudoyberdi will pay back the loan over 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Алимардонов Худойберди, возраст – 34 года, образование – высшее, по специальности педагог, женат, имеет 2-х детей. Худойберди занимается разведением и продажей крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже в течение 11 лет. Полученный кредит он хочет использовать для приобретение крупного рогатого скота. Он планирует откармливать скот и продавать его через каждые 40-45 дней. Полученную прибыль он будет использовать на содержание своей семьи, так как этот вид деятельности является его основным источником дохода. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase livestock

loans.name: Fathulo

texts.ru:
Fathulo N. is 40 years old, has a high school education, is married and has 5 children. Fathulo owns a minivan that he uses to transport passengers. He has been in this business for 1 year. Fathulo will use his loan to fix his car and to purchase necessary parts. This loan will give him the opportunity to fix his car and provide passengers with comfortable, fast and inexpensive transportation around the city and local areas. He will pay back the loan over 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Нарзуллаев Фатхулло, возраст – 40 лет, образование – среднее, женат, имеет 5-х детей. Фатхулло имеет свой собственный микроавтобус, на котором оказывает услуги по перевозки людей. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже в течение 1 года. Полученный кредит он хочет использовать на ремонт своей автомашины, то есть приобретение балонов и других запчастей. Этот кредит даст возможность Фатхулло отремантировать свой автомобиль, для того чтобы люди могли воспользоваться удобным, быстрым и недорогим транспортом для передвижения по городу или поездки в районы. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев

loans.use: Purchase parts for and repair vehicle

loans.name: Mohira

texts.ru:
Mohira H. is 43 years old, has a high school education, is divorced and has 2 children. Mohira is a wholesaler of cotton. She has been in this business for 10 years. This is her main source of income. Mohira will use her loan to purchase a large amount of cotton. This loan will help her to get the required quantity of cotton, which she plans to resell after processing. Local residents will have the opportunity to purchase cotton from her, as it used in making mattresses and comforters. She plans to pay back the loan over 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Ходжаева Мохира, возраст – 43 года, образование – среднее, разведённая, имеет 2-х детей. Мохира занимается оптовой продажей ватой. Этим видом деятельности она занимается уже в течение 10 лет. Это её основной источник дохода. Полученный кредит он хочет исползовать на приобретение большого количества ваты. Данный кредит поможет ей приобрести необходимое количество ваты, которая после обработки она планирует продать. Местные жители будут иметь возможномть приобретать у неё вату, так как она используется для пошива нациоанльных матрасов и одеял. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase Cotton for Sale

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: Toshgul

texts.ru:
Toshgul T. is 30 years old, has a high school education, is married and has 4 children. Toshgul has a small plot of land next to her house. She would like to use the loan to purchase seeds for planting wheat as they are currently cheaper than they will be in one month. She has been in this business for 5 years.

This loan will allow Toshgul to purchase wheat for planting, plant her land, collect a harvest and use the wheat to make flour and bread for personal use. A bag of flour costs much more at a store. Toshgul plans to sell part of her harvest in order to pay back the loan. She will pay back the loan over a 12 month period.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Тохирова Тошгул, возраст – 30 лет, образование – среднее, замужем, имеет 4 – х детей. Тошгул имеет небольшой приусадебный участок возле своего дома. Так как наступает посевной сезон, она хочет получить кредит и приобрести семена пшеницы, так как в настоящее время цена на них намного ниже, чем будет через месяц. Этим видом деятельности она занимается уже в течение 5 лет. Данный кредит даст ей возможность приобрести семена пшеницы, засеять участок земли, собрать урожай и использовать пшеницу для производства муки и выпечки хлеба для личног потребления. Так как мешок муки в магазине стоит намного больше. Часть собранного урожая она планирует продать после его сбора для погашения кредита. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase wheat for planting

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: Mehrubon

texts.ru:
Mehrubon O. is 21 years old, has a high school education and is married. Mehrubon raises and sells livestock. She will use her loan to purchase several pieces of livestock. After fattening them she will sell them and will use her revenues to purchase young calves over a 12 month period. Her husband helps her in her business. Mehrubon will pay back the loan during a 12 months period.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer.

Олимова Мехрубон, возраст – 21 год, образование среднее, замужем, детей не имеет. Мехрубон занимается разведением и продажей крупного рогатого скота. На полученный кредит она хочет приобрести несколько голов крупного рогатого скота. После их откормки она будет продавать их и на вырученные деньги приобретать молодых бычков и так в течение 12 месяцев. В этом ей помогает её муж. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: Purchase Livestock

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: Ashurali

texts.ru:
Ashurali M. is 31 years old, has a high school degree, is married and has no children. He is making his living by raising and selling cattle. Ashurali is planning to use his loan to purchase two calves. After fattening, every 40-45 days, he will sell the calves and use the money to purchase additional animals. He is planning to use the income to support his family and pay back his loan. Cattle sales are the main source of revenue for his family.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Масконов Ашурали -31 год, образование среднее, женат, детей не имеет. Клиент занимается разведением и продажей крупного рогатого скота. На полученный кредит он планирует приобрести 2-х бычков .После откормки, через каждые 40-45 дней он будет продавать их , а на вырученные деньги приобретать новое поголовье. Прибыль полученная от продажи бычков будет использоваться на содержание своей семьи и погашение кредита. Этот вид деятельности является основным источником его дохода.

loans.use: purchase of two calves for fattening and sale

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 24, 2008)

loans.name: Barot

texts.ru:
Barot T. is 46 years old, has a high school degree, is married and has 5 children. Barot owns a small plot of land where he grows wheat. He is planning to use the loan to purchase wheat seeds. He will then plant his plot and harvest the grain, which he will mill into flour and bake bread for his family's consumption, since the flour in the grocery stores is much more expensive.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Тагоев Барот-46 лет,женат,имеет 5 детей.Образование средние.Имеет небольшой участок земли на котрой сеет пшеницу. На полученный кредит он планирует приобрести семена пшеницы для засева участка. Этот кредит даст возможность приобрести семена пшеницы, засеять участок и получить урожай,который он сможет использовать для перемолки муки и выпечки хлеба для личного употребления, так как готовая мука в магазинах стоит намного дороже. ,

loans.use: purchase of wheat seeds

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: Davlatmurod

texts.ru:
Davlatmurod Hikimatov is a resident of the Varzob region. He works as a tractor driver in the farmers cooperative, but also raises cattle. He is planning to use this loan to purchase a milk cow. The cow will allow his family to have access to milk and the unused milk will be sold so that he can provide his seven children with other necessary groceries.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Хикматов Давлатмурод житель Варзобского района. Работает трактористом в колхозе, а также занимается животноводством.Запрашиваемый кредит использует на приобретение дойной коровы.Молоко позволит дать возможность обеспечить семью молоком,а также дополнительным источником дохода, то есть лишнее молоко он сможет продавать и обеспечить семерых детей другими необходимыми продуктами.

loans.use: purchase of cattle

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 22, 2008)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of a photocopy machine

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Action Now: Kenya (ANK) - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Kuvvat

texts.ru:
Kuvvat A. is 56 years old and has a college degree in education. He is married and has six children. Kuvvat currently works as a teacher in the local school in the Yavan region. To supplement his salary he has also been raising cattle for sale for the last 15 years. Kuvvat is planning to use the loan to purchase cattle for fattening. Every 40-45 days he will sell the animals and purchase new calves. He will use the income from the animal sales to support his large family, since the salary of a teacher is not always enough. Kuvvat is planning to pay back the loan in the next 18 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Адинаев Кувват, возраст – 56 лет, образование – высшее, по специальности педагог, женат, имеет 6-х детей. Куват в настоящее время работает в средней школе Яванского района. Помимо этого он также занимается разведением крупного роагтого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже в течение 15 лет. Полученный кредит он хочет использовать на приобретение крупного рогатого скота. Через каждые 40-45 дней после откормки он будет покупать откормленный скот и приобретать вдругой. Прибыль он будет использовать на содержание семьи, так как не всегда заработная плата преподавателя хватает. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 18 месяцев.

loans.use: purchase and sale of cattle

loans.name: Sulaymon

texts.ru:
Sulaymon A. is 46 years old, has finished high school, is married and has 5 children. Sualymon has been raising cattle for the last 15 years and this is the main source of his income. He is planning to use the loan to purchase a calf for the purpose of fattening it up and selling it. He is planning to fatten and sell cattle for the next 6 months. He will use the money to support his family. Sulaymon is planning to pay back the loan in the next 6 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Азизов Сулаймон, возраст – 46 лет, образование –среднее, женат, имеет 5-х детей. Сулаймон занимается разведением крупного рогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже в течение 15 лет и это основной источник, который ему приносит доход. На полученный кредит он хочет приобрести молодого бычка, для откорма и продажи. Таким образом он хочет откармливать и продавать скот в течение 6 месяцев. Полученную прибыль будет использовать на содержание своей семьи. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 6 месяцев.

loans.use: purchase and sale of cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of an assortment of tailoring cloth materials

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Action Now: Kenya (ANK) - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Vasyl'

texts.en:
Vasyl’ is divorced with two grown children. He and his family live in Ivano-Frankivsk. Vasyl’ sells slippers and terry-cloth robes in the central city market. He has been in this trade for 3 years. Currently, he has about $4000 in inventory. His monthly income is about $1100.

Vasyl’ would like to receive a loan of $1200 to purchase 150 pairs of slippers, 150 terry-cloth robes and 50 sets of underwear to sell in his kiosk. He would like to invest generated profit in a second vending facility and stock it with inventory. One of his personal goals is to eventually remodel his apartment and improve his living conditions. We believe Vasyl’s focused approach to business and his diligent hard-work will help him repay this loan on time and expand his business as a result.

loans.use: Purchase clothing inventory

loans.name: Atabek

texts.ru:
Atabek N. is 53 years old, has finished high school, is married and has seven children. Atabek owns a small plot of land on which he is planning to raise wheat. He is planning to use the loan to purchases wheat seeds. This loan will help him buy what seeds, plant his plot and harvest the grain, which he will mill into flour and bake bread for his own use. Flour sold in stores is much more expensive then the flour he will be able to make himself. This wheat harvest will be enough for him and his family for the next year. Atabek is planning to pay back the loan in the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Нурмахмадов Атабек, возраст – 53 года, образование – среднее, женат, имеет 7-х детей.Атабек имеет небольшой участок земли, на которм он хочет посадить пшеницу. Полученный кредит он хочет использовать на приобретение семян пшеницы. Кредит поможет ему закупить семена пшеницы, засеять участок и получить урожай пшеницы, который он использует для переработки в муку и выпечку хлеба для личного потребления. Так как готовая мука в магазине стоит намного больше, чем та которая будет производится подобным образом. Собранный урожай хватит ему и его семье до следующего сезона. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: purchase of wheat seeds

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase inventory

loans.name: Fayzali

texts.ru:
Fayzali N. is 23 years old, has finished high school, is married and has no children. Fayzali has 5 years experience in agriculture. He is planning to use the loan to purchase wheat seeds. The loan will help him buy the seeds of wheat, plant his plot and harvest the wheat which he will mill into flour and bake bread for his own use. Fayzali is planning to pay back the loan in the next 12 months.

Translated from Russian by Anya Lyuksyutova, Kiva volunteer

Нуриддинов Файзали, возраст – 23 года, образование – среднее, женат, детей не имеет. Файзали имеет 5 летний опыт в сельском хозяйстве. Полученный кредит он хочет использовать на приобретение семян пшеницы. Кредит поможет ему закупить семена пшеницы, засеять участок и получить урожай пшеницы, который он использует для переработки в муку и выпечку хлеба для личного потребления. Клиент планирует выплатить кредит в течение 12 месяцев.

loans.use: purchase of wheat seeds

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for MLF HUMO - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase of a drill, a battery charger, and an air-cooled welding machine

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for Action Now: Kenya (ANK) - Oct 23, 2008)

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio has a small company which provides curtain installation, as well as carpet installation in offices and private homes. He has three children who attend school and his wife works as well. They live in the zone called Las Nieves in the city of La Paz. This is the 10th loan from Impro, and it will be used to purchase materials for his business. His business qualifies him to receive this credit, and his experience shows he will generate enough income to repay the loan.

Julio tiene una pequeña microempresa dedicada a realiza trabajos de instalación de cortinas y rieles, también recibe contratos para el colocado de alfombras y tapiz en oficinas y domicilio particulares. Tiene tres hijas en edad escolar y su esposa es comerciante. Vive en la zona de Las Nieves ladera Oeste de la ciudad de La Paz. Es la décima segunda vez que solicita un crédito en IMPRO. El monto solicitado será destinado para la compra de materia prima (Tela, Hilo y rieles) Su trabajo le permite acceder a este crédito ya que tiene experiencia en el mismo, lo cual le permite la obtención de ingresos como para cubrir el préstamo.

loans.use: TO PURCHASE MATERIAL FOR HIS CURTAIN AND RUG BUSINESS.

loans.name: Rosalinda's Group

texts.en:
Genoveva, Karina, and Rosalinda have been members of the community bank “Las Golondrinas” for two years. In that time they have learned to be responsible, punctual, and to save. They also said that in the community bank they felt like someone believed in them.

Genoveva is 43 years old, and has one child. She has a business selling cebiche, which is a typical dish made from marinating fish in lemon juice. She has had this business for four years. Before that, she sold fresh orange juice. She hopes to start selling juices again, to compliment her cebiche.

Karina is 28 years old, and has two young children. She runs an auto parts business with her husband. Before that she had a business selling used clothing, but decided to change in order to realize a greater profit.

Rosalinda is 30 years old and also has two children. She now owns a restaurant, which she began many years ago. She sold her food from a cart. Five years ago she was able to buy space in a building to start her current business.

Genoveva, Karina, and Rosalinda need loans of 400, 2000, and 600 soles (3 soles = $1), which they will invest in fruits, a juicer, a larger variety of auto parts, plates, cups, and food for the restaurant.

The community bank emphasizes the importance of saving and each associate has an interest earning savings account. Genoveva has epilepsy and is saving for treatment. Karina hopes to be able to hire a mechanic to work in her business, and Rosalinda would like to open a small grocery store in addition to her restaurant.
